title: DevLinkShare
description: Devlink app is a cutting-edge web application designed to simplify and streamline the way developers showcase their online presence. This innovative platform allows developers to consolidate their various professional profiles and development-related links into a single, easily shareable URL.
extras: You can register and login with your details

title: Designo
description: Designo is a sophisticated multi-page website that serves as a compelling showcase of typography and design intuitiveness while demonstrating exceptional mobile responsiveness. The user interface is designed with a focus on intuitiveness, allowing visitors to navigate seamlessly between pages and sections. This is achieved through clear visual cues, consistent layout patterns, and strategically placed call-to-action elements

title: Carent Web
description: This project involves the creation of a dynamic and visually appealing landing page designed for car rental companies. The landing page serves as an introduction to a SaaS (Software as a Service) platform that streamlines and enhances the management of car rental operations.

title: Carent Admin
titleLong: Carent - SaaS Platform for Car Rental Companies
description: CarRent Pro is a comprehensive Software as a Service (SaaS) solution designed to revolutionize the operations of car rental companies. This web-based platform streamlines every aspect of car rental management, from inventory tracking to customer management, fleet management and reporting & analytics.
extras: Click on the login button to go to dashboard, no login details needed
